p: This media company is looking for a Senior Developer who has a focus on python development and proficiency with Reactjs. You will be joining a small senior team of developers who are working on building out their marketplace!

li.2: Ability to communicate directly and pitch your own ideas on features/functionalities

li.1: $500 WFH sign-on bonus to upgrade your space
li.2: Fully covered benefits for yourself and your family
li.4: A portion of your internet bill will be paid for
li.5: Full Remote / Will send MacBook Pro

p.6: Eligible locations: OR, WA, CA, CO, ID, AZ, TX, IL
